verses.verse: וִיהוֹרָ֣ם <WH3088> Now Jehoram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְאָ֗ב <WH256> of Ahab מָלַ֤ךְ <WH4427> began to reign עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> over Israel בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <WH6240> teen לִיהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> And he wrought הָרַע֙ <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD רַ֕ק <WH7535> but לֹ֥א <WH3808> like כְאָבִ֖יו <WH1> but not like his father וּכְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> and like his mother וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <WH5493> for he put away אֶת־ <WH853> מַצְּבַ֣ת <WH4676> the image הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had made אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> that his father

רַ֠ק <WH7535> but בְּחַטֹּ֞אות <WH2403> unto the sins יָרָבְעָ֧ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֛ט <WH5028> of Nebat אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֥יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> which made Israel דָּבֵ֑ק <WH1692> Nevertheless he cleaved לֹא־ <WH3808> did not סָ֖ר <WH5493> he departed מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at ס

וּמֵישַׁ֥ע <WH4338> And Mesha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become נֹקֵ֑ד <WH5349> was a sheepmaster וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> and rendered לְמֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאָה־ <WH3967> an hundred אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> thousand כָּרִ֔ים <WH3733> lambs וּמֵ֥אָה <WH3967> and an hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אֵילִ֥ים <WH352> rams צָֽמֶר׃ <WH6785> with the wool

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become כְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> was dead אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> But it came to pass when Ahab וַיִּפְשַׁ֥ע <WH6586> rebelled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> that the king מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> went out הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> And king יְהוֹרָ֛ם <WH3088> Jehoram בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the same time הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he מִשֹּׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> and numbered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> all Israel

וַיֵּ֡לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> and sent אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֨ט <WH3092> to Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab פָּשַׁ֣ע <WH6586> hath rebelled בִּ֔י הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> go אִתִּ֛י <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> against מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> with me against Moab לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to fight וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> saying אֶעֱלֶ֔ה <WH5927> I will go up כָּמ֧וֹנִי <WH3644> according to כָמ֛וֹךָ <WH3644> you כְּעַמִּ֥י <WH5971> I [am] as thou [art] my people כְעַמֶּ֖ךָ <WH5971> as thy people כְּסוּסַ֥י <WH5483> [and] my horses כְּסוּסֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5483> as thy horses

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵי־ <WH335> how זֶ֥ה <WH2088> he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> Which way נַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> shall we go up וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> ? And he answered דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> The way מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> through the wilderness אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> went מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> So the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמֶֽלֶך־ <WH4428> and the king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom וַיָּסֹ֕בּוּ <WH5437> and they fetched a compass דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> of seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days' וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become מַ֧יִם <WH4325> and there was no water לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <WH4264> for the host וְלַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and for the cattle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that בְּרַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7272> that followed

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲהָ֕הּ <WH162> Alas כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָרָ֣א <WH7121> together יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God לִשְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> these three הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to deliver אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <WH3092> But Jehoshaphat הַאֵ֨ין <WH369> is there פֹּ֤ה <WH6311> here נָבִיא֙ <WH5030> [Is there] not here a prophet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנִדְרְשָׁ֥ה <WH1875> that we may enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵאוֹת֑וֹ <WH854> for וַ֠יַּעַן <WH6030> answered אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> by him? And one מֵעַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> servants מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel's וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said פֹּ֚ה <WH6311> is here אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> Here [is] Elisha בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֔ט <WH8202> of Shaphat אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָ֥צַק <WH3332> which poured מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water עַל־ <WH5921> on יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> on the hands אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> of Elijah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> is אוֹת֖וֹ <WH854> for דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <WH3381> went down אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> with him So the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <WH477> And Elisha אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מַה־ <WH4100> What לִּ֣י וָלָ֔ךְ לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> thee to the prophets אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to נְבִיאֵ֖י <WH5030> and to the prophets אִמֶּ֑ךָ <WH517> of thy mother וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אַ֗ל <WH408> No כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָרָ֤א <WH7121> together יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto him Nay for the LORD לִשְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> these three הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to deliver אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֗ע <WH477> And Elisha חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom עָמַ֣דְתִּי <WH5975> whom I stand לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before כִּ֗י <WH3588> for לוּלֵ֛י <WH3884> surely were it not that פְּנֵ֛י <WH6440> the presence יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I נֹשֵׂ֑א <WH5375> I regard אִם־ <WH518> nor אַבִּ֥יט <WH5027> I would not look אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> at וְאִם־ <WH518> nor אֶרְאֶֽךָּ׃ <WH7200> toward thee nor see

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now קְחוּ־ <WH3947> But now bring לִ֣י מְנַגֵּ֑ן <WH5059> me a minstrel וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> came כְּנַגֵּ֣ן <WH5059> And it came to pass when the minstrel הַֽמְנַגֵּ֔ן <WH5059> played וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> came עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> that יַד־ <WH3027> that the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD עָשֹׂ֛ה <WH6213> Make הַנַּ֥חַל <WH5158> this valley הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this גֵּבִ֥ים ׀ <WH1356> full of ditches גֵּבִֽים׃ <WH1356> full

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִרְא֥וּ <WH7200> Ye shall not see ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> wind וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> neither shall ye see גֶ֔שֶׁם <WH1653> rain וְהַנַּ֥חַל <WH5158> yet that valley הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he יִמָּ֣לֵא <WH4390> shall be filled מָ֑יִם <WH4325> with water וּשְׁתִיתֶ֛ם <WH8354> that ye may drink אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you וּמִקְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4735> both ye and your cattle וּֽבְהֶמְתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH929> and your beasts

וְנָקַ֥ל <WH7043> And this is [but] a light thing זֹ֖את <WH2063> in בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> the Moabites בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> also into your hand

וְהִכִּיתֶ֞ם <WH5221> And ye shall smite כָּל־ <WH3605> every עִ֤יר <WH5892> city מִבְצָר֙ <WH4013> every fenced וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עִ֣יר <WH5892> city מִבְח֔וֹר <WH4004> and every choice וְכָל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree טוֹב֙ <WH2896> every good תַּפִּ֔ילוּ <WH5307> and shall fell וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַעְיְנֵי־ <WH4599> all wells מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of water תִּסְתֹּ֑מוּ <WH5640> and stop וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> every הַחֶלְקָ֣ה <WH2513> piece הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> every good תַּכְאִ֖בוּ <WH3510> and mar בָּאֲבָנִֽים׃ <WH68> of land with stones

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> happened בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> And it came to pass in the morning כַּעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> was offered הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> when the meat offering וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> that behold there came מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of Edom וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the country אֶת־ <WH854> with הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> with water

וְכָל־ <WH3605> now all מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> And when all the Moabites שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> heard כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָל֥וּ <WH5927> were come up הַמְּלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> that the kings לְהִלָּ֣חֶם <WH3898> to fight בָּ֑ם וַיִּצָּעֲק֗וּ <WH6817> against them they gathered מִכֹּ֨ל <WH3605> and all חֹגֵ֤ר <WH2296> all that were able to put חֲגֹרָה֙ <WH2290> on armour וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward וַיַּעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and stood עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּבֽוּל׃ <WH1366> in the border

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <WH7925> And they rose up early בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְהַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> and the sun זָרְחָ֣ה <WH2224> shone עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> upon the water וַיִּרְא֨וּ <WH7200> saw מוֹאָ֥ב <WH4124> and the Moabites מִנֶּ֛גֶד <WH5048> on the other side אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> the water אֲדֻמִּ֥ים <WH122> [as] red כַּדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> as blood

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they said דָּ֣ם <WH1818> This [is] blood זֶ֔ה <WH2088> This הָחֳרֵ֤ב <WH2717> are surely נֶֽחֶרְבוּ֙ <WH2717> slain הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> the kings וַיַּכּ֖וּ <WH5221> and they have smitten אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> another וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Now לַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> to the spoil מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> now therefore Moab
